long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the benefits of this extension: 
It helps you learn without much effort, even when you're not feeling motivated. You won't get bored by the context because its the websites YOU browse anyways. The words you learn are the ones used the most in every language. It  has over 80 languages, no personal data is used or stored at all and it's totally free.

New with version 0.1.0:
- you can now always see the translation if you don't remember the vocabulary
- the disable slider is now a button that lets you choose for how long you want to disable the extension
- optical improvement on the size of the input field and '?' button

New with version 0.0.3:
- balanced leveling
- fixed playback speed of gifs
